languages.text:
{n}Приложив тонкий палец к губам скорбной рогатой маски, незнакомец с насмешкой произносит:{/n}
"Мой лик — немая тень среди теней".

traits.locale_text:
{n}Приложив тонкий палец к губам скорбной рогатой маски, незнакомец с насмешкой произносит:{/n}
"Мой лик — немая тень среди теней".
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Harlequin

languages.text:
{n}The stranger presses a delicate finger to the lips of his sorrowful mask and says with a twinkle in his eye,{/n}
"A shadow in the shadows will I be."

traits.locale_text:

"A shadow in the shadows will I be."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Harlequin

languages.text:
{n}这位陌生人将一根纤细的手指按在悲伤面具的嘴唇上，双眼中闪着光芒。{/n}
“我将成为阴影之中的影子。”
languages.original_text:
{n}The stranger presses a delicate finger to the lips of his sorrowful mask and says with a twinkle in his eye,{/n}
"A shadow in the shadows will I be."

traits.locale_text:
{n}这位陌生人将一根纤细的手指按在悲伤面具的嘴唇上，双眼中闪着光芒。{/n}
“我将成为阴影之中的影子。”
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Harlequin

languages.text:
{n}見知らぬ人物は悲しみに満ちた仮面の口元に細い指を当てて、目を輝かせながら言った。{/n}
「影の中に身を潜めよう」
languages.original_text:
{n}The stranger presses a delicate finger to the lips of his sorrowful mask and says with a twinkle in his eye,{/n}
"A shadow in the shadows will I be."

traits.locale_text:
{n}見知らぬ人物は悲しみに満ちた仮面の口元に細い指を当てて、目を輝かせながら言った。{/n}
「影の中に身を潜めよう」
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Harlequin

languages.text:
{n}El desconocido coloca un delicado dedo sobre los labios de su afligida máscara y dice con un resplandor en la mirada:{/n}
«Seré, pues, una sombra entre las sombras».
languages.original_text:
{n}The stranger presses a delicate finger to the lips of his sorrowful mask and says with a twinkle in his eye,{/n}
"A shadow in the shadows will I be."

traits.locale_text:
{n}El desconocido coloca un delicado dedo sobre los labios de su afligida máscara y dice con un resplandor en la mirada:{/n}
«Seré, pues, una sombra entre las sombras».
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Harlequin

languages.text:
{n}L'inconnu presse un doigt délicat contre les lèvres de son masque à l'expression triste, puis, avec une lueur dans le regard, dit :{/n}
« Je serai une ombre parmi les ombres. »
languages.original_text:
{n}The stranger presses a delicate finger to the lips of his sorrowful mask and says with a twinkle in his eye,{/n}
"A shadow in the shadows will I be."

traits.locale_text:
{n}L'inconnu presse un doigt délicat contre les lèvres de son masque à l'expression triste, puis, avec une lueur dans le regard, dit :{/n}
« Je serai une ombre parmi les ombres. »
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Harlequin

languages.text:
{n}Der Fremde legt einen zarten Finger auf die Lippen seiner traurigen Maske und sagt mit einem Augenzwinkern:{/n}
"Ein Schatten im Schatten werde ich sein."
languages.original_text:
{n}The stranger presses a delicate finger to the lips of his sorrowful mask and says with a twinkle in his eye,{/n}
"A shadow in the shadows will I be."

traits.locale_text:
{n}Der Fremde legt einen zarten Finger auf die Lippen seiner traurigen Maske und sagt mit einem Augenzwinkern:{/n}
"Ein Schatten im Schatten werde ich sein."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Harlequin

languages.text: {n}Yabancı, narin parmaklarından birini hüzünlü maskesinin dudaklarına bastırıp gözlerinde kıvılcımla konuşuyor.{/n} "Gölgeler içindeki gölgeyim bunun üzerine."
languages.original_text:
{n}The stranger presses a delicate finger to the lips of his sorrowful mask and says with a twinkle in his eye,{/n}
"A shadow in the shadows will I be."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yabancı, narin parmaklarından birini hüzünlü maskesinin dudaklarına bastırıyor ve gözlerinde bir kıvılcımla konuşuyor:{/n} "Gölgeler içindeki gölgeyim bunun üzerine."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Harlequin
